                  Boolean overwrite)
        Adds the specified player's PlayerStats and allows for manually overwriting if required.
        Parameters:
        _stats - The PlayerStats of the player with their UUID respectively.
        overwrite - Whether or not to manually overwrite the stats if they already exist.
